title: recover() in function called from deferred function
body:
by **radoslavrabara**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?

Defer a call to function, which call another function that contains recover() statement:

http://play.golang.org/p/wrqqt62IXa

What is the expected output?
a()
b()
panic

What do you see instead?
a()
b()
<nil>

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?
6g

Which operating system are you using?
Ubuntu

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')
go version go1.1.1 linux/386
